description:
Copywriting is the king of skills when it comes to selling anything online whether you are selling an E-book, a Course, Software, Coaching program, Seminars, or Whatever - you need a Persuasive sales letter that Compel People to Take their credit card out and buy.

Copywriting is all about writing persuasive words. Words that have an impact on the reader and convince them to take action.

Itâ€™s similar to direct response marketing in the offline world which is an Industry worth over $170 million and for that reason, the courses in direct marketing have a hefty price tag.  However, an academic course on copywriting in the offline world does not always help you when you try to do it online. And direct response courses take a long time and cost a fortune.

In fact, it is for this very reason that entrepreneurs are willing to pay vast sums of money to their copywriters. The quality of the words being used to sell has a direct impact on the volume of sales being made.

In this short course, that consists of 12 short  videos in section one and two bonus bonus  videos in section two, you will learn everything you need to know in order to write a successful copy for your product or service. The videos are fairly short,  ranging from 2 to 5 minutes each,  which means we are going to significantly shorten the learning curve. The truth is, you can spend countless hours (and dollars) mastering the art of copywriting in a formal setting.

But today we're just going to give you precisely what you need to know to become an effective copywriter. Nothing more, nothing less. In addition to the videos, you will also get some documents and an ebook to help you on your way.
title: Persuasive Writing For Online Business
